mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into store (title, phone, city, address, areaname, latitude, longitude, avg_score, comments, backCateName, store_id, avg_price, source_key, source_data, creat_time, update_time) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{avgScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{comments,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backcatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avgPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sourceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update store set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, areaname = #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, avg_score = #{avgScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=INTEGER}, backCateName = #{backcatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avg_price = #{avgPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_key = #{sourceKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_data = #{sourceData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, title, phone, city, address, areaname, latitude, longitude, avg_score, comments, backCateName, store_id, avg_price, source_key, source_data, creat_time, update_time from store where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
